name: Silex
author: Alex Hoyau aka lexoyo

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:js:release
scripts.build:js:release: java -jar node_modules/superstartup-closure-compiler/build/es6compiler.jar --js submodules/closure-library/closure/goog/ --js src/js/ --externs src/externs.js --js_output_file dist/client/js/admin.js --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT3 --create_source_map dist/client/js/admin.js.map --closure_entry_point silex.App --only_closure_dependencies --manage_closure_dependencies --define="goog.DEBUG=false"
scripts.build:js:debug: java -jar node_modules/superstartup-closure-compiler/build/es6compiler.jar --debug --js submodules/closure-library/closure/goog/ --js src/js/ --externs src/externs.js --js_output_file dist/client/js/admin.js --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT3 --create_source_map dist/client/js/admin.js.map --closure_entry_point silex.App --only_closure_dependencies --manage_closure_dependencies --define="goog.DEBUG=true" && echo "//# sourceMappingURL=/js/admin.js.map" >> dist/client/js/admin.js
scripts.watch:server: npm run livereload:start; node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run build:server; npm start; npm run livereload:changed' dist/server/
scripts.watch:client: npm run livereload:start; node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run build:js:debug; npm run build:css; npm run build:html; npm run livereload:changed' src/
scripts.lint:js:inactive: echo "FIXME PRECOMMIT HOOK: FIX ISSUES OF 'npm run lint:js' AND THEN ACTIVATE IT AGAIN IN PRECOMMIT HOOK"
scripts.lint:server:inactive: echo "FIXME PRECOMMIT HOOK: FIX ISSUES OF 'npm run lint:server' AND THEN ACTIVATE IT AGAIN IN PRECOMMIT HOOK"

keywords: free website builder with source code
